Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory49.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Roland, how are you feeling?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I must thank you. If it hadn't been for that thing you brought back, I wouldn't have improved so much.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Well, this is what Miss Luna has hoped for.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "Just don't lose to the Babylonia people again.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "That's blunt. I will try.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Ascendants are gathered in an empty church. Sunlight sneaks through the cracks in the walls and falls on their elegant figures.'}
{2: '???', 3: "That's it? You will try?"}
{3: 'The church door slowly opens. Hearing the sound behind them, Roland and Gabriel stand to attention and salute. Alpha walks over to the door in a welcoming manner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'So... is that all you have to say? You will try?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The owner of the voice, Luna, walks over and asks again, her manner brisk and passionless.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Yes, Miss Luna, I will try.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Alpha furrows her eyebrows at Roland's answer. Gabriel shivers a little but quickly regains his calm."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Mm, I will be watching.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Luna's timely smile relaxes the tension before it escalates into something ugly. A certain someone feels relieved. Meanwhile, Roland and Gabriel finish their salute."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "Since Miss Luna is here, why don't you update us on the progress of your mission... Miss Lamia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss Lamia?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gabriel quickly moves on to the next topic, but this Lamia girl is unresponsive, as if she was somewhere else.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "I haven't seen her since I got here...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "You've been hiding here all along, have you, Lamia? Show up right now, or I'm gonna blow this place up.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Wait, wait, wait! Are you a devil!?'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Not a devil, but an Ascendant. Now stop being invisible and show yourself!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm here. Just lower your gun. I surrender!"}
{3: "Succumbing to Roland's threat, a monstrous feminine figure emerges from a dark corner. Despite her timid manner, she is actually an Ascendant working under Luna."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "I just want to remind you it's time to quit slacking and get back to work.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I... I'm not slacking. I went to Akdilek and that disgusting ship... like I was told to.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I went into invisibility... only because I don't like crowds...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Which is another way of saying "slacking off". So, you must have come into contact with certain people, right?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Anyway, the task I gave you, how did it go, Lamia?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unfazed by the silly farce unfolding before her, Luna unhurriedly walks over to Lamia and asks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Uh... about that... I think I failed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "The leaders of Kowloong Corp refused to get on board with our plan, but neither would they be complicit in Babylonia's plot.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "They said they'd rather decide the future of Earth on their own, without meddling from anyone.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'How naive! Do they honestly think they can be neutral in a world like this?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "So don't get mad at me. I'm just the messenger!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "My sister is not mad at you. She just can't understand their stupidity.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'But can you understand it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Neither can I, of course.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'So, Miss Luna, does that mean...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "The power of Heteromers is under our control. Roland's frame has been enhanced. And most importantly, Babylonia is on its way to becoming a corporation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "We can't let Babylonia beat us to it. Everyone, it's time to move.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Just as Kowloong said.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'We will decide the future of Earth!', 4: '1'}
